title: Microsoft art gallery (MAC)
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Interactive media
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Multimedia systems
description: Presenting the celebrated art collection of the National Gallery, London. Take a guided tour, in vivid colour, with animation and sound, of the works of the great masters such as Titian, Monet, Michaelangelo, Turner and others. Whether you're a casual browser or a serious student, from the delicate line of da Vinci to the blazing sworls of van Gogh, you'll find information and inspiration. SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS: Macintosh computer; 13" (640x480) 256-colour or higher-resolution monitor; sytem 6.0.7 or later; 4 Mb of RAM; at least 1 Mb of available hard disk space; CD-ROM drive.
